definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut

sentences.english: She is an inveterate reader of silly love stories.
sentences.chinese: 她長年不變地讀愚蠢的愛情小說。

sentences.english: The block decoupling problem for linear time-invariant systems is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論線性時不變系統的塊解耦問題。

sentences.english: Decreased overall still in channels, short-short pattern is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 總體仍處於下跌通道中，短期空頭格局不變。

sentences.english: At cooling phase, the LITS remains constant.
sentences.chinese: 在降溫階段，LITS卻保持不變。

sentences.english: If the electric field added is unchangeable , what produces is the direct current.
sentences.chinese: 如果所加的電場不變，產生的是直流電。

sentences.english: The melt of slim yellow and pink is deducing the subject of love forever.
sentences.chinese: 昏黃與粉色調的交織，輕輕演繹永久不變的愛的主題。

sentences.english: Compared to the pre-MBA survey, the percentage of working in manufacturing industry basically unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 與入學前相比，製造業的比例基本保持不變。

sentences.english: The abrasion resistance of air entraining concrete has little changes when salts added into concrete.
sentences.chinese: 引氣混凝土中摻鹽後耐磨性基本不變。

sentences.english: He possessed that will and purpose which are the invariable forerunners of success.
sentences.chinese: 他擁有這種意願和目標，這正是成功不變的先決條件。

sentences.english: Curiosity is one of the permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
sentences.chinese: 好奇心是構成智慧的一項恆久不變的重要特徵。

sentences.english: You cannot change thhe victim's time of death, however soon it may be.
sentences.chinese: 但無論怎樣更改，死亡時間不變。

sentences.english: The world is in continuous flux and is impermanent .
sentences.chinese: 世界變遷不已，並非是常久不變的。

sentences.english: Using this invariability, the geometrical distortion is first retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 使用這種不變性，首先檢索的幾何失真。

sentences.english: In this paper, a translation invariance wavelet transform is applied to image denoise.
sentences.chinese: 文中主要研究平移不變小波變換在圖象降噪中的應用。

sentences.english: The basic layered technique has remained consistent across the years, but the chosen plants have not.
sentences.chinese: 基礎層在一年中保持不變，植物的選擇則年年不同。

sentences.english: Fell like the left side stays high with no change in the spine angle.
sentences.chinese: 感覺左肩稍高，以保持脊柱角度不變。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
